CustomField.formula: AND( Account_Status_Updated__c = "Existing Customer", NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "Fleet Insurance Partner")), OR( AND( Customer_ARR__c >= 1000000, ISPICKVAL(BillingCountryCode, "US"), NOT(CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "SLED")) ), AND( Customer_ARR__c >= 650000, OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(BillingCountryCode, "US")), CONTAINS(Owner_Role__c, "SLED") ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: HUB Account
